options.label: A
options.text: A type of energy that causes the universe to expand at a constant rate

options.label: B
options.text: A type of energy that causes the universe to expand at an ever-increasing rate

options.label: C
options.text: A type of matter that causes the universe to expand at a constant rate

options.label: D
options.text: A type of matter that causes the universe to expand at an ever-increasing rate

multiple-choice.question: How can galaxy clusters help us learn more about dark energy?

options.label: A
options.text: By studying the formation of structure in the universe

options.label: B
options.text: By studying the destruction of structure in the universe

options.label: C
options.text: By studying the largest scales of the universe

options.label: D
options.text: By studying the smallest scales of the universe

multiple-choice.question: Why is it important to study galaxy clusters and the universe?

options.label: A
options.text: To find solutions to obvious problems

options.label: B
options.text: To find solutions to difficult problems that require scientific ingenuity

options.label: C
options.text: To prove existing theories

options.label: D
options.text: To disprove existing theories
